Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for the pension benefits for first grade police officers of the city of New York who have served for 25 or 30 years
Summary: Provides for the pension benefits for first grade police officers of the city of New York who have served for 25 or 30 years.
LawCode: Amd ยง14-111, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the pensionable earnings of first grade police officers
